changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_withdrawal" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "wallet_id" UUID NULL, "asset_id" UUID NOT NULL, "amount" DECIMAL(19, 4) NOT NULL, "amount_usd" DECIMAL(19, 4) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "tx_hash" CHAR(66) NULL, "destination_address" CHAR(42) NOT NULL, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "tb_user"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("wallet_id") REFERENCES "tb_wallet"("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("asset_id") REFERENCES "tb_asset"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
